isis.stitle: TSI 02-12-27 - New Torque Value for Fractured Type Connecting Rod Bolts

subjectgroup.subject: New Torque Value for Fractured Type Connecting Rod Bolts

geninfo.para: The service bolt torque value for fractured type connecting rods has increased. By increasing the tension specification, this ensures adequate service clamp load.
The new torque value for the fractured type connecting rod bolts is:
This new torque value replaces the old value 156 N·m (115 lbf-ft).

This new torque value is to be applied only to the fractured type connecting rod assemblies. Fractured type connecting rods have been in production I6 engines with engine serial number 1363044 and above.
This new torque must also be used when a complete set of fractured type rods are used as service replacements in engines with serial number 1194039 through 1363043.

note.para: See EGES-210 Service Manual and TSI- 02-12-09 for service procedures.
